topics.body:
!http://www.anime-planet.com/images/manga/main_images/mob-psycho-100.jpg!
Another Comic by the author of the original One-punch man. Mob Psycho 100.

It's basically about a plain looking Kid who's actually an incredibly powerful Esper. (Who has to keep his emotions suppressed in order to keep his powers from going out of control.)

It's apparently somewhat similar to OPM in tone.
